casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Donnie J. FARRAR. No. 628P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of December *3682006 by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review N.C.G.S. 7A-28":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
